H0.text: What is the substance that causes irritation from a sting by a nettle or an ant. Histamine

H1.text: What is the substance that causes irritation from a sting by a nettle or an ant. Acetylcholine

H2.text: What is the substance that causes irritation from a sting by a nettle or an ant. Serotonin

H3.text: What is the substance that causes irritation from a sting by a nettle or an ant. E236

A4.text: Histamine binding to endothelial cells causes them to contract, thus increasing vascular leak.

A5.text: Histamine is involved in the inflammatory response and has a central role as a mediator of itching.
